summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 1.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 114 m) and rainfall (down 1.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1700 m), rainfall (down 1.5 mm), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok and winds will be practically absent. Drizzle or light rain possible, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
